name: Loading Rig
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
text: The rig is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rig must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Unstable
text: If the rig takes damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated with a speed of 0 until a creature activates it with a successful DC 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check made as an action.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The armor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
